all.title: Add dark mode
all.description: Implement a dark mode for users who prefer low-light environments.

all.title: Add image upload
all.description: Allow users to upload profile images.

all.title: Add video tutorials
all.description: Include detailed video tutorials for new users.

all.title: Improve loading speed
all.description: Optimize backend for faster loading times.

all.title: Add tags for solutions
all.description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

all.title: Customizable dashboards
all.description: Allow users to customize their dashboards with widgets.

all.title: Fix login issue
all.description: Users report being unable to log in with their Google accounts.

all.title: Challenge timer not stopping
all.description: The timer continues after completing the challenge.

all.title: Image previews not loading
all.description: Preview images fail to load in certain browsers.

features.title: Add dark mode
features.description: Implement a dark mode for users who prefer low-light environments.

features.title: Add image upload
features.description: Allow users to upload profile images.

features.title: Add video tutorials
features.description: Include detailed video tutorials for new users.

features.title: Live collaboration
features.description: Allow multiple users to collaborate in real-time.

features.title: Offline mode
features.description: Enable offline functionality for some key features.

features.title: Dark mode scheduling
features.description: Allow dark mode to automatically turn on at sunset.

features.title: Voice commands
features.description: Add voice command support for hands-free operation.

enhancements.title: Improve loading speed
enhancements.description: Optimize backend for faster loading times.

enhancements.title: Add tags for solutions
enhancements.description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

enhancements.title: Customizable dashboards
enhancements.description: Allow users to customize their dashboards with widgets.

enhancements.title: Export challenge progress
enhancements.description: Add an option to export progress reports.

enhancements.title: Add more themes
enhancements.description: Include more color themes for UI customization.

enhancements.title: Bulk action support
enhancements.description: Enable bulk actions on challenges and users.

enhancements.title: Enhanced search filters
enhancements.description: Add more detailed filters for search.

enhancements.title: Custom notifications
enhancements.description: Allow users to set custom notifications for events.

enhancements.title: Improved mobile responsiveness
enhancements.description: Enhance the mobile layout and responsiveness.

bugs.title: Fix login issue
bugs.description: Users report being unable to log in with their Google accounts.

bugs.title: Challenge timer not stopping
bugs.description: The timer continues after completing the challenge.

bugs.title: Image previews not loading
bugs.description: Preview images fail to load in certain browsers.

bugs.title: Notifications not appearing
bugs.description: Some users are not receiving notifications.

bugs.title: Form validation error
bugs.description: Form fields are not validating correctly on the mobile view.

bugs.title: Incorrect profile stats
bugs.description: Profile stats are displaying incorrect values for completed challenges.

bugs.title: Video tutorials not loading
bugs.description: Tutorial videos occasionally fail to load.

bugs.title: Password reset email not sent
bugs.description: Some users are not receiving password reset emails.

bugs.title: UI glitches on Safari
bugs.description: Certain UI elements are misaligned on Safari browser.

bugs.title: Search results not updating
bugs.description: Search results do not update when filters are applied.
